name: Coastal Beaches Adventure
description: Escape the crowds and embark on a full-day adventure to discover the hidden coastal beaches of the Whitsundays. This tour offers a blend of relaxation and exploration, perfect for those seeking a laid-back yet enriching experience. Journey through picturesque landscapes, including sugar cane fields and cattle country, to reach secluded beaches like Dingo Beach, Rocky Beach, and more. Ideal for nature lovers, photographers, and anyone looking to unwind in breathtaking settings. Led by a passionate local guide, Cherene, this tour provides unique insights into the region's history and landscapes.
includes:
Guided scenic tour of 5 beaches
Local tour guide
Transportation
Photography opportunities
highlights:
Scenic drive through the Whitsundays hinterland
Visit to Dingo Beach, Rocky Beach, Nelly’s Bay, and more
Photography moments at Froggies Beach Lookout
Relaxation at Cape Gloucester Resort with optional gourmet lunch
Insightful stories and history shared by guide Cherene
ideal_for: Nature lovers, photographers, families, and those looking to relax and explore the beautiful, uncrowded beaches of the Whitsundays.

name: Bushwalk and 50's Diner Guided Tour
description: Embark on a unique journey that combines the tranquility of nature with a nostalgic twist. This guided tour takes you through the lush rainforest trails of Conway National Park, offering an intimate look at the Whitsundays’ inland ecosystems. Led by Cherene, a seasoned eco-tourism guide, you'll gain cultural insights and discover the rich biodiversity of the area. After the invigorating bushwalk, step back in time at George’s 50s Diner, where retro charm and legendary milkshakes await. Ideal for those seeking a low-key, offbeat adventure, this tour is a delightful escape into the past and nature.
includes:
Guided commentary
Return transport to the bushwalk location
Return transport to George’s Diner
highlights:
Guided rainforest bushwalk in Conway National Park
Explore Kingfisher Circuit or Coral Beach track
Learn from a certified Savannah and Eco Nature Guide
Step into a 1950s-themed American-style diner
Enjoy jukebox tunes, neon signs, and comfy booths
Experience the best milkshakes in Australia
Perfect blend of nature and nostalgia
Offbeat adventure full of local character
ideal_for: Nature enthusiasts, retro lovers, families, and anyone looking for a quirky, short escape
